html: thirsted not/led them through the deserts/caused the waters to flow/rock. These statements refer to blessings the Lord gave to Israel in the wilderness (Num. 20:7-11; Deut. 8:15; Ps. 78:15-20; 2 Ne. 25:20). Likewise, the Lord will lead us through spiritual deserts and give us living waters to drink (41:18; 43:19; 44:3). The rock symbolizes Christ, the source of our living water (see commentary on 51:1; see also John 4:10-11; 7:38).
